mapper.select: SELECT p.*, i.* FROM product p, product_info i WHERE p.prod_id = i.prod_id AND p.prod_id = #{prod_id}
SELECT p.*, i.* FROM product p, product_info i WHERE p.prod_id = i.prod_id ORDER BY p.prod_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (evt_gp_id, prod_img_id, cat_code, prod_name, prod_price, disc_rate, sale_sts, prod_qty, is_exch, is_opt, short_desc, long_desc, disp_sts, rg_num, md_num) VALUES (#{evt_gp_id}, #{prod_img_id}, #{cat_code}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_price}, #{disc_rate}, #{sale_sts}, #{prod_qty}, #{is_exch}, #{is_opt}, #{short_desc}, #{long_desc}, #{disp_sts}, #{rg_num}, #{md_num})

INSERT INTO product_info (prod_id, prod_desc_id, brand, origin, dlvy_type, seller, pack_type, sales_unit, weight, exp_date, as_guide) VALUES (#{prod_id}, #{prod_desc_id}, #{brand}, #{origin}, #{dlvy_type}, #{seller}, #{pack_type}, #{sales_unit}, #{weight}, #{exp_date}, #{as_guide})
INSERT INTO product_image (prod_img_id, prod_id, ori_file_name, ser_file_name, rg_num, md_num) VALUES (#{prod_img_id}, #{prod_id}, #{ori_file_name}, #{ser_file_name}, #{rg_num}, #{md_num})

INSERT INTO option_product (opt_prod_id, prod_id, opt_prod_name, opt_price, opt_disc_price, opt_prod_qty, opt_prod_sts, rg_num, md_num) VALUES (#{opt_prod_id}, #{prod_id}, #{opt_prod_name}, #{opt_price}, #{opt_disc_price}, #{opt_prod_qty}, #{opt_prod_sts}, #{rg_num}, #{md_num})
